Ingredients.12: 1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, rinsed and chopped

Ingredients.13: 1 medium head bibb or Boston lettuce, separated into leaves

Ingredients.14: 2 tablespoons Onions, spring or scallions (includes tops and bulb), raw

Ingredients.15: 2 tablespoons shredded carrots, or to taste

Directions.1: Combine hoisin sauce, soy sauce, ginger, rice vinegar, Sriracha sauce, sesame oil, and garlic in a bowl; mix to combine and set aside.

Directions.2: Place tofu onto a plate and place another plate on top. Set a 3- to 5-pound weight on top. Press tofu for 20 to 30 minutes; drain and discard the accumulated liquid.

Directions.3: Heat oil in a skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Crumble tofu into the skillet and cook for 5 minutes. Add onion and cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in mushrooms and water chestnuts and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.

Directions.4: Stir in hoisin mixture and mix well. Cook enough for the liquid to reduce some.

Directions.5: Serve with lettuce and garnish with green onions and carrots.
